item.title: Wildy/Name at top of screen glitch
item.dc:creator: @Joshe94 Joshe94
item.description:
@Joshe94 wrote:

Hey,

I have a little problem,

I added this code below under the public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

//Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @yel@GhostlyScape", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Made By Josh", 6572); sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

Now when I enter wildy, it doesn’t show me the wildy skull or wildy level.

Sometimes when I walk it flashes the wildy skull.

I would appreciate it if someone could please explain to me how to fix this.

Thanks
